page.title: 14COMMON FARM
page.content:
{
COMMON FARM HAS 1300 ANIMALS ALTOGETHER.THEY CONSIST OF 700 PIGS ,400 SHEEP AND 200 CATTLE OF MIXED BREED . THE FARMER FATTENS SOME OF HIS COWS FOR BEEF , THE REST ARE DAIRY . HE SELLS 2000 OF HIS FATTENED PIGS TO SAINSBURYS (A WELL KNOWN SUPERMARKET) PER ANNUM. HE USES 150 EWES FOR PRODUCING FAT LAMB . HE SELLS WOOL TO THE BRITISH WOOL MARKETING BOARD . HIS FARM CONSISTS OF 500 ACRES OF LAND , 300 OF WHICH ARE USED FOR WINTER WHEAT. HE ALSO GROWS OIL SEED FOR MARGERINE , BARLEY FOR BREWERIES AND PEAS FOR COMPOUND FEEDING. HE USES MODERN MACHINERY LIKE TRACTORS ,COMBINE HARVESTERS ETC. WHICH HE REPLACES EVERY 2-3 YEARS.
